string-array.name: quotes
string-array.item: Always say \'yes\' to the present moment... Surrender to what is. Say \'yes\' to life - and see how life starts suddenly to start working for you rather than against you. --Eckhart Tolle
The present moment, if you think about it, is the only time there is. No matter what time it is, it is always now. --Marianne Williamson
Life gives you plenty of time to do whatever you want to do if you stay in the present moment. --Deepak Chopra
A great hallmark of mental wellness is the ability to be in the present moment, fully and with no thoughts of being elsewhere. --Wayne Dyer
